"As members of Congress reflect on their pending decision, I urge them to set aside political considerations.‚Äù ‚ÄîPresident Obama #IranDeal

"Now we have before us a solution that prevents Iran from obtaining a nuclear weapon without resorting to war." ‚ÄîPresident Obama #IranDeal
"President Kennedy warned Americans not to see conflict as inevitable. It is time to apply such wisdom.‚Äù ‚ÄîPresident Obama #IranDeal
"I have repeatedly challenged anyone opposed to this deal to put forward a better, plausible alternative." ‚ÄîPresident Obama #IranDeal
"When we carefully examine the arguments against this deal, none of them stand up to scrutiny.‚Äù ‚ÄîPresident Obama #IranDeal
"If Iran violates this deal, we will have ample opportunity to respond." ‚ÄîPresident Obama #IranDeal
"Worry less about being labeled weak. Worry more about getting it right.‚Äù ‚ÄîPresident Obama #IranDeal
"How can we in good conscience justify war before we have tested a diplomatic agreement that achieves our objectives?" ‚ÄîPresident Obama

‚ÄúWalk away from this agreement and you will get a better deal‚Äîfor Iran.‚Äù ‚ÄîPresident Obama #IranDeal

‚ÄúAn argument against sanctions relief is effectively an argument against any diplomatic solution.‚Äù ‚ÄîPresident Obama #IranDeal
"Without this deal, the scenarios that critics warn about happening in 15 years could happen six months from now." ‚ÄîPresident Obama
"The bottom line is, if Iran cheats, we can catch them‚Äîand we will." ‚ÄîPresident Obama #IranDeal
‚ÄúThis deal is not just the best choice among alternatives‚Äîthis is the strongest non-proliferation agreement ever.‚Äù ‚ÄîPresident Obama
‚ÄúIf Iran violates the agreement over the next decade all of the sanctions can snap back in to place.‚Äù ‚ÄîPresident Obama #IranDeal
"Iran has powerful incentives to keep its commitments." ‚ÄîPresident Obama #IranDeal
"This deal shuts off the type of covert program Iran has pursued in the past.‚Äù ‚ÄîPresident Obama #IranDeal
"This deal shuts off the type of covert program Iran has pursued in the past.‚Äù ‚ÄîPresident Obama #IranDeal
"In July, we reached a comprehensive plan of action that meets our objectives." ‚ÄîPresident Obama #IranDeal
"What was once proclaimed as a historic mistake is now held up as a success." ‚ÄîPresident Obama #IranDeal

"It was diplomacy that ratcheted up the pressure on Iran." ‚ÄîPresident Obama #IranDeal
"Winning this global buy-in was not easy. I know. I was there." ‚ÄîPresident Obama #IranDeal
"What made our new approach more effective was our ability to draw upon new U.N. Security Council resolutions." ‚ÄîPresident Obama #IranDeal
‚ÄúIt was our very willingness to negotiate that helped America rally the world to our cause.‚Äù ‚ÄîPresident Obama #IranDeal

"The question then is not whether to prevent Iran from obtaining a nuclear weapon, but how." ‚ÄîPresident Obama #IranDeal
